resolution: Feature already implemented in commit 891fad3b on 2025-12-30 03:24:43. The configure_ticket_keys function in src/tls/SocketTLSContext-session.c already contains the requested defensive assertions: assert(ctx != NULL), assert(key != NULL), and assert(key_len == SOCKET_TLS_TICKET_KEY_LEN) at lines 204-206.
commit_message: feat(tls): add defensive assertions to configure_ticket_keys (#2409)
